content.raw:
`find @CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/share -path @CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/share/gazebo-'*'/setup.sh | sort | tail -n 1` is very slow and causes a significant lag if inserted in .bashrc
A better solution should be provided.
A simple workaround is to add the argument `-type f` in find to specify not to search folder names.
content.html: find @CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/share -path @CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX@/share/gazebo-'*'/setup.sh | sort | tail -n 1 is very slow and causes a significant lag if inserted in .bashrc A better solution should be provided. A simple workaround is to add the argument -type f in find to specify not to search folder names.
